Shinsengumi fan coming out of lurkdom here to just give my two cents worth..
While I admit yaoi is not normally my taste I do accept it as part of the genre and the subject matter certianly does NOT reflect on the talent of the artist. I happened to think the artwork itself was wonderful, certianly anything beyond *my* skill. While I was there I checked out some of the other artwork there and each one seemed better than the last.
A few years ago a creative writing teacher consoled me in a similiar situation with some advice;think of it as ice cream. There are hundreds of different varieties of ice cream and the only flavor that almost everyone can agree on they like in general is vanilla---and only because its pretty bland. Bland=Boring. 

To the artist; I saved your site to my favorites and am really looking forward to seeing more of your work and of others posted on this list. Never be bland, dear. 

----- Original Message ----
From: kikue.mugen <kikue.mugen@...>
To: SHQ_Spy_Division@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Saturday, April 12, 2008 7:28:18 PM
Subject: [SHQ_Spy_Division] Re: Wonderful Saito and Soji Original Art


Dear Shinsengumi fan,
To some of us, this disgusting is a good disgusting. Relax, no one's 
mad at you for having an opinion. But this is a forum for intelligent 
discussion and not the, "oh ewwwww disgusting," and leave it at that. 
Least you can do is tell us why.  Or maybe, tell us why you were 
offended.  You know, be civil about it, or els the poor artist may be 
traumatized from this whole issue of disgust.


--- In SHQ_Spy_Division@yahoogroups.com, "l17842" <l17842@...> wrote:
>
> Oh, no... It's just disgusting, sorry...
